rajya buddhi sewaye adhyaksha nilantha jayawira mahathage adahas dakwimak samaga rauswima aarambha wiya.wiwidha jathin niyojanaya karamin diwayine danata anthawadi sanwidhana 20 kata adhika sankhyawak ki්rayathmaka wemin thibena bawath, ema anthawadi sanwidhana siyallakma jathin athara sanhidiyawata pa්rabala tharjanayak bawath ohu anawaranaya kaleya.nam washayenma ema kandayam hadunwadun ohu ethanin nonawathi eewaye nayakayinwa da nam washayen sadahan kaleya.atham bauddha himiwarunge saha muslim kandayam wala ki්rayakarakam gana jayawira wisheshayen sadahan kaleya.muslim kandayam atharin thawuhing jamath sanwidhanayata ohuge wadi awadhanaya yomu wiya.ayies sanwidhanayata badimata atham muslim pawul diwayinen pitathwa gos athayi da buddhi ansha adhyakshawaraya heli kaleya.

pasugiya marthu masaye aga fonseka mahatha fild marshal dhurayata usas karunu athara ohuta himiwu wishrawa watupa athulu siyalu waraprasada himi wiya.mewara maha mathiwaranaya gana puwathpathaka sakachchawakata ek wu perera mahatha kiwe eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya me maha mathiwaranaye di niyatha washayenma parajaya wana bawayi.eksath jathika pakshaya thawath paksha kihipayak samanga aandu karana bawath, mahinda rajapaksha mahathata agamathi wime kisidu hakiyawak nathi bawath ohu kiweya.maha mathiwaranaye sandhanaye kolambaa disthrikkaya niyojanaya karana prabhalayaku athulu prabhalayan kihipa denaku parajaya wana bawath ohu kiweya.idiri maha mathiwaranaye di janatha wimukthi peramune balaya tharamak wadi wanu athi bawa da perera mahatha anawaki pala karayi.
